Rgee: Demo

Source: vignettes/rgee_demo.Rmd
rgee_demo.Rmd

1) Load libraries

library(rgee)
library(sf)
library(cptcity)
library(mapview)
library(leaflet)
library(rnaturalearth)
library(reticulate)

Initialize earthengine

ee_Initialize(drive = TRUE)
#> Registered S3 method overwritten by 'dplyr':
#>   method         from     
#>   print.location geojsonio
#> Getting Google Drive credentials ...
#> Error: Can't get Google credentials.
#> Are you running googledrive in a non-interactive session? Consider:
#>   * `drive_deauth()` to prevent the attempt to get credentials.
#>   * Call `drive_auth()` directly with all necessary specifics.

2) Study area

Defining study area with sf object

world_map <- ne_countries(returnclass = "sf")
world_map <- world_map[world_map$name=='Ecuador',]
plot(world_map[1])

ee_Ecuador <- world_map %>% st_geometry() %>% sf_as_ee(check_ring_dir = TRUE)
#> Registered S3 method overwritten by 'crul':
#>   method                 from
#>   as.character.form_file httr
#> Registered S3 method overwritten by 'geojsonlint':
#>   method         from 
#>   print.location dplyr

3) Search into the Earth Engine Data Catalog

Defining study area with sf object

ee_dataset() %>%
  ee_search_type("ImageCollection") %>%
  ee_search_tagstitle("landsat", "toa", "l8", logical_operator = "AND") %>%
  '['(1,'id') -> l8_name

4) Call the EE ImageCollection

ic_l8 <- ee$ImageCollection(l8_name)$
  filterBounds(ee_Ecuador)$
  filterDate("2015-01-01", "2017-12-31")
#> Error in py_call_impl(callable, dots$args, dots$keywords): EEException: Server returned HTTP code: 404
#> 
#> Detailed traceback: 
#>   File "/home/aybarpc01/.local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/ee/computedobject.py", line 32, in __call__
#>     return type.__call__(cls, *args, **kwargs)
#>   File "/home/aybarpc01/.local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/ee/imagecollection.py", line 38, in __init__
#>     self.initialize()
#>   File "/home/aybarpc01/.local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/ee/imagecollection.py", line 72, in initialize
#>     super(ImageCollection, cls).initialize()
#>   File "/home/aybarpc01/.local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/ee/collection.py", line 32, in initialize
#>     apifunction.ApiFunction.importApi(cls, 'Collection', 'Collection')
#>   File "/home/aybarpc01/.local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/ee/apifunction.py", line 183, in importApi
#>     cls.initialize()
#>   File "/home/aybarpc01/.local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/ee/apifunction.py", line 154, in initialize
#>     signatures = data.getAlgorithms()

#>     return send_('/algorithms', {}, 'GET')
#>   File "/home/aybarpc01/.local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/ee/data.py", line 1835, in send_
#>     'Server returned HTTP code: %d' % response.status)

5) Add NDVI band (FLOAT) into the ImageCollection

addNDVI <- function(image) {
  ndvi = image$normalizedDifference(c('B5', 'B4'))$rename('NDVI');
  return(image$addBands(ndvi))
}

6) Quality mosaic vs Simple mean

vizparams <- list(max=0.3, bands=c('B4', 'B3', 'B2'))

ic_l8_mean <- ic_l8$map(addNDVI)$mean()$clip(ee_Ecuador)
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'ic_l8' not found
ic_l8_mosaic <- ic_l8$map(addNDVI)$qualityMosaic('NDVI')$clip(ee_Ecuador)
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'ic_l8' not found

map_1 <- ee_map(ic_l8_mean,vizparams = vizparams,objname = 'mean')
#> Error in ee_map(ic_l8_mean, vizparams = vizparams, objname = "mean"): object 'ic_l8_mean' not found
map_2 <- ee_map(ic_l8_mosaic,vizparams = vizparams,objname = 'quality')
#> Error in ee_map(ic_l8_mosaic, vizparams = vizparams, objname = "quality"): object 'ic_l8_mosaic' not found
map_1 + map_2
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'map_1' not found

7) Fast Download (< 5mb)

Download EE thumbnail images and read them as stars objects

ecuador_stars <- ee_as_thumbnail(ic_l8_mosaic,vizparams = vizparams)
#> Error in ee_as_thumbnail(ic_l8_mosaic, vizparams = vizparams): object 'ic_l8_mosaic' not found
image(ecuador_stars, rgb = c(3,2,1))
#> Error in image(ecuador_stars, rgb = c(3, 2, 1)): object 'ecuador_stars' not found

6. Download using Google Chrome (> 5mb)

Resampling the image for a more faster download (this step could be omitted)

image_to_download <- ic_l8_mosaic$
  select(c('B4','B3','B2'))$
  reproject(crs = "EPSG:4326", scale = 2500)
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'ic_l8_mosaic' not found

Passing from Earth Engine to Google Drive

task_img <- ee$batch$Export$image$toDrive(
  image = image_to_download,
  folder = "ecuador_mosaic",
  fileFormat = "GEOTIFF",
  fileNamePrefix = "ecuador_mosaic"
)
#> Error in py_resolve_dots(list(...)): object 'image_to_download' not found

ee_manage_cancel_all_running_taks()

task_img$start()
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'task_img' not found
ee_monitoring() # Monitoring task progress (Optional)
#> Error in py_call_impl(callable, dots$args, dots$keywords): EEException: Server returned HTTP code: 404
#> 
#> Detailed traceback: 
#>   File "/home/aybarpc01/.local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/ee/batch.py", line 139, in list
#>     statuses = data.getTaskList()
#>   File "/home/aybarpc01/.local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/ee/deprecation.py", line 32, in Wrapper
#>     return func(*args, **kwargs)
#>   File "/home/aybarpc01/.local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/ee/data.py", line 1115, in getTaskList
#>     r = send_('/tasklist', params, 'GET')
#>   File "/home/aybarpc01/.local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/ee/data.py", line 1835, in send_
#>     'Server returned HTTP code: %d' % response.status)

Passing from Google Drive to Hard disk

ecuador_stars <- ee_download_drive(task_img)
#> Error in basename(task$status()$destination_uris): object 'task_img' not found
plot(ecuador_stars)
#> Error in plot(ecuador_stars): object 'ecuador_stars' not found
image(ecuador_stars, rgb = c(1,2,3))
#> Error in image(ecuador_stars, rgb = c(1, 2, 3)): object 'ecuador_stars' not found
